character.name: Rosa
description: Her cards generate lots of <c=keyword>card draw</c>, as well as apply various <c=keyword>negative status ailments</c> to the enemy.

Patient.name: Patient
Patient.description: If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, <c=keyword>discount</c> it.

CostMod.name: Cost Mod
CostMod.description: This card's cost has been changed for the rest of combat.

Frazzle.name: Frazzle
Frazzle.description: Every turn, take <c=keyword>{0}</c> damage and <c=downside>decrease this by 1.</c>

SuperBoost.name: Super Boost
SuperBoost.description: Add <c=keyword>{0}</c> to all statuses you gain.

Rebuttal.name: Rebuttal
Rebuttal.description: Whenever this ship is hit, it gains <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>DRAW NEXT TURN</c>.

Sympathy.name: Sympathy
Sympathy.description: Whenever the opposing ship moves, this ship moves <c=keyword>{0}</c> spaces in the opposite direction. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 each turn.</c>

Silence.name: Silence
Silence.description: All non-attack actions are negated. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 each turn.</c>

Diploma.name: DIPLOMA
Diploma.description: For the first 3 turns of combat, draw <c=card>+1 card</c>.

Ego.name: EGO
Ego.description: At the end of each turn gain 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> for each unique negative status the enemy has.

NumberTicket.name: NUMBER TICKET
NumberTicket.description: For every card drawn past your max hand size, gain 1 <c=status>DRAW NEXT TURN</c>.

ThinkingCap.name: THINKING CAP
ThinkingCap.description: The first time you get a full hand each turn, gain 1 <c=status>ENERGY</c>.

Philosophy.name: PHILOSOPHY
Philosophy.description: Cards that cost 3 or more energy gain <c=cardtrait>patient</c> at the start of combat.

Peace.name: PEACE
Peace.description: Gain 1 <c=status>ENERGY</c> every turn if you did not attack the previous turn.

BrainFood.name: BRAIN FOOD
BrainFood.description: At the end of your turn, <c=cardtrait>discount</c> all cards in your hand. <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> and <c=cardtrait>Expensive</c> no longer decay when used. <c=downside>When a card is played, increase it's energy cost by 1.</c>

CleoBooks.name: CRYSTALLINE REFINEMENT
CleoBooks.description: When you play a <c=card>Crystal Shard</c>, the card you draw gains <c=cardtrait>Improved A</c>. Will instead use the B upgrade if A is not an option.

CleoCat.name: NEXT GEN OS
CleoCat.description: Upon pickup, gain an <c=boldPink>A upgraded</c> <c=card>Basic Shot</c>, <c=card>Basic Dodge</c>, and <c=card>Basic Block</c>.

CleoDizzy.name: REACTIVE SHIELDS
CleoDizzy.description: When you <c=action>Impair</c> a card gain 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> If it is a <c=40a4fc>Dizzy</c> card, give it <c=cardtrait>Improved A</c>. Will instead use the B upgrade if A is not an option.

CleoDrake.name: THERMAL INHIBITORS
CleoDrake.description: When you <c=action>Improve</c> a card lose 1 <c=status>HEAT</c>. When you <c=action>Impair</c> a card gain 1 <c=status>HEAT</c>.

CleoMax.name: FILE REROUTING
CleoMax.description: When you <c=action>exhaust</c> an <c=boldPink>upgraded</c> card, <c=action>draw</c> an <c=boldPink>upgraded</c> card from your <c=keyword>Draw pile</c>.

CleoRiggs.name: BOBA+
CleoRiggs.description: For every 3 <c=boldPink>upgraded</c> cards you draw, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c>.

description.None: 1 outgoing <c=status>boost</c>. Add a <c=card>Knock 'Em Down</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.
description.A: 1 outgoing <c=status>boost</c>. Add a <c=card>Knock 'Em Down A</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.
description.B: 2 outgoing <c=status>boost</c>. Add a <c=card>Knock 'Em Down B</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.

description.None: 1 outgoing <c=status>underdrive</c>. Add a <c=card>Set 'Em Up</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.
description.A: 1 outgoing <c=status>underdrive</c>. Add a <c=card>Set 'Em Up A</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.
description.B: 1 outgoing <c=status>underdrive</c>. Add a <c=card>Set 'Em Up B</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.
